dt: {bc}a private showing or preview of an art exhibition

et: borrowed from French, "day before an exhibition opens reserved for artists to varnish and put finishing touches on their paintings" (probably after English {it}varnishing day{/it}), literally, "varnishing," from {it}vernisser{/it} "to varnish" (going back to Middle French {it}vernecier, vernicier{/it}) + {it}-age{/it} {et_link|-age|-age} {ma}{mat|varnish:2|}{/ma}
shortdef: a private showing or preview of an art exhibition
